document_data.name: Forest Monarch
document_data.mainbody: A '''Forest Monarch''' was a special kind of tree in the [[Feywild]]. More than mere trees, they were emblems of the [[Feywild]], vessels of life force, and primeval spirits.
document_data.Description: One of those trees had a trunk over {{SI|100|feet|long=yes}} in diameter; after petrifying itself, its bare branches had transformed into a vaulted cyst atop the tree.
document_data.History: One forest monarch captured [[the Traitor]] while the latter fled from [[Stardeep]] after the [[Spellplague]], around the year {{Yearlink|1385}}. The tree petrified the Traitor, sacrificing itself as well in the process.
